testCases.description: SMALL goal - Simple technical project, should estimate < 20 hours

scope.definition_of_done: A working bot that responds to /start and /help commands, deployed to production

testCases.description: MEDIUM goal - Learning goal, should estimate 20-100 hours

scope.definition_of_done: Can hold a 30-minute conversation in Spanish on everyday topics

testCases.goalTitle: Build a SaaS platform with user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard
testCases.description: MEDIUM goal - Complex technical project, should estimate 20-100 hours

scope.definition_of_done: MVP deployed with user signup/login, subscription management, and admin panel for user management

testCases.goalTitle: Create a full-stack e-commerce platform with inventory management, order processing, shipping integration, customer reviews, recommendation engine, and mobile app
testCases.description: LARGE goal - Very complex project, should estimate > 100 hours

scope.definition_of_done: Complete e-commerce platform with all features deployed and mobile apps published to app stores

testCases.description: SMALL goal - Simple creative task, should estimate < 20 hours

scope.definition_of_done: A published blog post of at least 1000 words with proper formatting and images

testCases.goalTitle: Build a mobile app for task management
testCases.description: MEDIUM goal - Mobile app development, should estimate 20-100 hours

scope.definition_of_done: Working mobile app with task CRUD operations, user authentication, and cloud sync, published to app stores

testCases.description: SMALL goal - Very simple web project, should estimate < 20 hours

scope.definition_of_done: A responsive landing page with contact form, deployed to production

testCases.goalTitle: Develop a comprehensive data analytics platform with real-time dashboards, automated reporting, machine learning predictions, and multi-tenant architecture
testCases.description: LARGE goal - Enterprise-level project, should estimate > 100 hours

scope.definition_of_done: Fully deployed analytics platform with all features, supporting 1000+ concurrent users, with ML models in production
